targets.query:
gg1=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN23051/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/gen1/E")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum(column: "_value")

  gg2=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305105/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/gen2/E")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum(column: "_value")

  gg3=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305105/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/gen3/E")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum(column: "_value")

  union(tables: [gg1, gg2, gg3])
  |> group(columns: [])  // Ungroup data to remove group keys
  |> sum(column: "_value")

reb1=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/mreb1/E")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum(column: "_value")

  reb2=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305105/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/mrebu3/E")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum(column: "_value")

  union(tables: [reb1, reb2])
  |> group(columns: [])  // Ungroup data to remove group keys
  |> sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305158/tx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/random/flow")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /(3600.0 *1000.00) }))
  |> sum(column: "_value")

dp1=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305102/tx"  ))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/deep1/flow")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /(3600.0) }))
  |> sum(column: "_value")

  dp2=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305103/tx"  ))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/deep2/flow")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /(3600.0) }))
  |> sum(column: "_value")

  dp3=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305099/tx"  ))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/deep3/flow")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /(3600.0) }))
  |> sum(column: "_value")

      union(tables: [dp1, dp2,dp3])
      |> group(columns: [])  // Ungroup data to remove group keys
  |>sum(column: "_value")

cpb1=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305112/tx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/cpb1/flow_rate")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum(column: "_value")

  cpb2=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305097/tx"  ))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/cpb2/flow_rate")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum(column: "_value")

  cpb3=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305098/tx"  ))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/cpb3/flow_rate")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum(column: "_value")

      union(tables: [cpb1, cpb2, cpb3])
      |> group(columns: [])  // Ungroup data to remove group keys
  |>sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN230510/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/gen1/P")
  |> last(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305105/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/gen2/P")
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305105/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/main/gen3/P")
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> last(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/gen2/E")
  |> last(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/gen2/E")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> window(every: 1h)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: inf)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

options.content: Effluent Treatment Plant

targets.query:
gg2=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305105/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/gen2/E")
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
     |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /1000.00 * 0.53/1000.0}))

     sb1=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305158/tx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/random/flow_rate")
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
     |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 3.00 * 0.056/1000.0}))


  union(tables: [gg2, sb1])
  |> group(columns: [])  // Ungroup data to remove group keys
  |> sum(column: "_value")

dom1 = from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305108/tx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/dom1/flow_rate")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])

  dom2=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305106/tx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/dom2/flow_rate")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])


union(tables: [dom1, dom2])
  |> group(columns: [])  // Ungroup data to remove group keys
  |> sum(column: "_value")

dy1=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305107/tx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/dyp1/flow_rate")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum(column: "_value")

  dy2=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305109/tx"  ))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/dyp2/flow_rate")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> sum(column: "_value")

      union(tables: [dy1, dy2])
      |> group(columns: [])  // Ungroup data to remove group keys
  |>sum(column: "_value")

targets.query:
from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305113/tx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/inlet/flow_rate")
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
